message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $11,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $9,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I can meet you halfway between $9,000 and $11,000, so I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,500.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. How about we settle at $9,750?  That's a fair compromise.

Hi Bob, I see you're trying to get closer to the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll sell the product to you for $10,250. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price for both of us.
Alice, thanks for your flexibility.  I'm willing to increase my offer slightly to $10,000.  This is my final offer, as I know I can get it from John for $12,000.
